game.name: Pit Pioneers
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A Lemmings-inspired puzzle game where you guide pioneers through treacherous underground caverns by strategically assigning abilities like digging, building, and blocking to overcome obstacles.
